title: Influence of the catalyst surface chemistry on the electrochemical self-coupling of biomass-derived benzaldehyde into hydrobenzoin
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00334A, Paper

Li Gong, Shiling Zhao, Jing Yu, Junshan Li, Jordi Arbiol, Tanja Kallio, Mariano Calcabrini, Paulina R. Martínez-Alanisa, Maria Ibañez, Andreu Cabot
The electroreduction of biomass-derived benzaldehyde (BZH) provides a potentially cost-effective route to produce benzyl alcohol (BA). This reaction competes with the electrochemical self-coupling of BZH to hydrobenzoin (HDB), which holds...
